abstract: NBA Roundup; Los Angeles Clippers defeat Detroit Pistons, 101-96; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Crawford scored a season-high 37 points, and the Los Angeles Clippers beat the Detroit Pistons, 101-96, Saturday at home to end a two-game skid.

headline.main: Jamal Crawford Propels Clippers to Victory in a Rare Start
headline.print_headline: Crawford Propels Clippers to Victory in a Rare Start

snippet: Crawford scored a season-high 37 points, and the Los Angeles Clippers beat the Detroit Pistons, 101-96, Saturday at home to end a two-game skid.
